GameObject.KindOf: PRELOAD SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS INFANTRY SCORE TRANSFORMER PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY PRELOAD FS_RADAR

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldtoParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_MineSuppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toMineSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toMineSuppressed") end;

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldBored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldIdleToSelected") end if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldfromParachuting") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ShieldSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_MinefromSuppressed") elseif Prev == "STATE_ShieldParachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldfromParachuting") elseif Prev == "STATE_ShieldSelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ShieldSelectedToIdle") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Suppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toSuppressed") end;
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_OverWater" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToWater") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_OverWater" or Prev == "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_FromWater") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_boredToAttention") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_Suppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromSuppressed") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") elseif Prev == "STATE_Selected" or Prev == "ATNB" or Prev == "STATE_Run" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end

DieMuxData.DeathTypesForbidden: ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED MAULED
BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
